author.name: Sam Turnbull • It Doesn't Taste Like Chicken

description: This is my favourite hearty classic vegan breakfast recipe. Spiced to perfection with peppers, beans, onions, and mushrooms for a perfect savoury brunch.
keywords: easy tofu scramble, easy vegan scrambled eggs
name: Tofu Scramble: Breakfast of (vegan) Champions
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon black salt (also called kala namak) or regular salt)
1 tablespoon oil (such as olive or vegetalbe)
1 454g block medium-firm tofu or firm tofu OR 2 349g blocks extra firm silken tofu
1 19oz can black beans (2 cups), (drained and rinsed)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the spice mix ingredients into a bowl and stir to combine.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the olive oil. When hot, add the mushrooms, pepper, onion, and garlic and sauté for about 8 minutes until everything just starts to brown.

Add the tofu blocks and break it apart with your spoon until you get a nice scramble texture with lots of chunks. Stir in the spice mix and black beans. Heat through for another 5 - 8 minutes until hot.

video.name: How To Make Tofu Scramble - Vegan Breakfast Recipe Easy.mp4
